mapper.sql: id, report_type, reported_item_id, reporter_id, reported_user_id, reason, status, resolution_notes, resolved_by_admin_id, created_at, resolved_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reports ( report_type, reported_item_id, reporter_id, reported_user_id, reason, status, resolution_notes, resolved_by_admin_id, created_at, resolved_at ) VALUES ( #{reportType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{reportedItemId}, #{reporterId}, #{reportedUserId}, #{reason}, #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{resolutionNotes}, #{resolvedByAdminId}, #{createdAt}, #{resolvedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reports SET status = #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, resolution_notes = #{resolutionNotes}, resolved_by_admin_id = #{resolvedByAdminId}, resolved_at = #{resolvedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM reports ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
